info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Elbert County through 345 PM EDT... At 312 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Elberton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberton, Middleton, Russell State Park, Lake Russell, Dewy Rose, Rock Branch, Sweet City, Ruckersville and Nuberg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
